|brand = Lite-On |model = WCBN603MH |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = February 6, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Lite-On_WCBN603MH |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = module |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = Mini PCIe |formfactor = (half)
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PPQ-WCBN603MH |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 20:68:9D
|chip1 = Marvell;88W8787; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 150/150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = Bluetooth |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/06/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "WCBN603MH_V02" and "323C1632929D" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device appears to be a Mini PCIe (half-size) module. :The device uses 88W8787-BKB2.
20:68:9D OUI per the FCC photos
